paragraph 1: The following table presents a rollforward of our restructuring liability as of September 30, 2019, which is included within accrued compensation and other current liabilities within our Consolidated Balance Sheet, (in millions):
paragraph 2: Certain restructuring costs are based upon estimates. Actual amounts paid may ultimately differ from these estimates. If additional costs are incurred or recognized amounts exceed costs, such changes in estimates will be recognized when incurred.
